arts.ttl: Preview: Port Vale vs. Morecambe - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's League Two clash between Port Vale and Morecambe, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.

Port Vale's 3-0 win over MK Dons at the weekend was their first win in five games, however they have lost just one of their last eight games. Morecambe's 2-2 draw with Barrow on Saturday made it just...
